about_the_game:
Arrowman lets you take on the role of a masked figure with no memory surrounded by a horde of monsters closing in, hungry for their next meal. Armed with only a bow you find nearby, you must fend off these relentless creatures.

On your travels you noticed that people seem to call you Arrowman – perhaps a hero of some sort? This might explain the unusual powers you’ve discovered. They are connected to your mask in some way, and you are quite certain that with time you will be able to adjust these powers to your liking.

People here are now counting on you to save them from these monsters they call Nightmares. There is a lot of them, so the plan is to destroy their source. However, some of these Nightmares seem to recognize you – why do they know who you are and what was your relationship with them?

Experience a fast-paced 2D action-platformer with hand-crafted levels that guide you through a series of different environments. As you progress, you'll unlock new abilities to overcome obstacles, and your exploration will be rewarded with upgrades, allowing for customization of your powers. Each level challenges you to master different combinations of arrows, each with its own unique properties.

short_description: Arrowman is a 2D action-platformer that focuses on archery combat. Travel through many lands and battle nightmarish foes, some of whom will seem oddly familiar, slowly revealing connections to your forgotten past. Master the bow and uncover the truth in this combat-driven quest.
